有一起玩的吗？ 加群720703480

玩归玩，骂归骂，游戏姑且还算是好游戏，但你动视暴雪还有烤迪克纯几把出生玩意无木东西。我本来就在战网玩的，为了骂你还特地腾出内存在Steam也装了一个守望本体。你个BYD东西大伙写的长短评都已经帮我嘴替了，那我送你两首诗不过分吧：
《​诗经·彼​阳》
彼阳若至，初升东曦。
绯雾飒蔽，似幕绡绸。
彼阳篝碧，雾霂涧滁。
赤石冬溪，似玛瑙潭。
彼阳晚意，暖梦似乐。
寐游浮沐，若雉飞舞。​
《诗经·梅木》
梅木冬溪，思慕晚意
飞舞洒碧，碧漾东西
梅覆梅木，梅游佳亭
泉佳似广，梅忧寂极
糙泥马壁，坻石洞溪
时复思母，消愁东曦​

祝你蒸蒸日上嗷，阿米诺斯，一得阁拉米，我阐释你的梦，腊鸡动视暴雪，出生烤迪克

Team Fortress 2 is a 2007 multiplayer first-person shooter game developed and published by Valve Corporation. It is the sequel to the 1996 Team Fortress mod for Quake and its 1999 remake, Team Fortress Classic. The game was released in October 2007 as part of The Orange Box for Windows and the Xbox 360, and ported to the PlayStation 3 in December 2007. It was released as a standalone game for Windows in April 2008, and updated to support Mac OS X in June 2010 and Linux in February 2013. It is distributed online through Valve's digital retailer Steam, with Electronic Arts managing retail and console editions.

Players join one of two teams—RED or BLU—and choose one of nine character classes to play as, with game modes including capture the flag and king of the hill. Development was led by John Cook and Robin Walker, the developers of the original Team Fortress mod. Team Fortress 2 was announced in 1998 under the name Team Fortress 2: Brotherhood of Arms. Initially, the game had more realistic, militaristic visuals and gameplay, but this changed over the protracted nine years of development. After Valve released no information for six years, Team Fortress 2 regularly featured in Wired News' annual vaporware list among other entries. Finally released on the Source game engine in 2007, Team Fortress 2 would preserve much of the core class-based gameplay of its predecessors while featuring an overhauled, cartoon-like visual style influenced by the works of J. C. Leyendecker, Dean Cornwell, and Norman Rockwell, alongside an increased focus on the visual and verbal characterization of its playable classes and what the developers have described as a 1960s spy movie aesthetic.

Recibe criticas completamente injustificadas, a pesar de tener contenido de pago, este no afecta para nada a la experiencia mas alla de las misiones de historia, en lo que coincido en que deberían haber sido gratuitas por lo menos las primeras. Pero por si solo es un juego divertido, con contenido actualizado, especialmente en esta temporada en la que se agregan un modo de juego competitivo, un heroe nuevo, nuevos minijuegos, mapas, y eventos. Gran parte del nuevo contenido es free to play, pero la gente parece que solo quieren las skins y no jugar. Además el pase se puede conseguir jugando gratis y coleccionando monedas.
Es un muy buen juego, balanceado, con contenido actualizado, que es lo importante en un FPS multijugador masivo. Ojala las misiones de historia algun dia sean por lo menos mas accesibles para conseguir, pero todo lo demas es bueno.

I have played since the original Overwatch 1 Beta. That game was one of my favorites. Blizzard decided to kill my favorite game and replace it with this disgustingly greedy free to play model. It is the same game minus one player and the team seems to be doing an even worse job balancing it. On top of that, Blizzard lie to its fans about the PVE aspect of the game. They forgot to add the "2" part to Overwatch 2. They knew they were cancelling the pve side of this game before they started selling the stupid waypoint bundle but they didn't say anything because they would make more money misleading their audience. Dishonest and gross behavior. They took a great game and made it worse. Only real addition to this game have been the skin shop. Previously you would have been able to unlock skins for free, now they are 20 bucks. Beyond disappointing.

And now the end is here, and so I face that final curtain. My friend I'll make it clear, I'll state my case, of which I'm certain.
I've lived a life that's full, I traveled each and every highway. And more, much more, I did it, I did it my way... Regrets, I've had a few... But then again... too few to mention... I did what I had to do, I saw it through without exemption. I planned each charted course, each careful step along the byway. And more, much, much more, I did it, I did it my way. Yes, there were times I'm sure you knew, when I bit off more than I could chew. But through it all, when there was doubt, I ate it up and spit it out. I faced it all and I stood tall and did it my way. For what is a man, what has he got? If not himself then he has naught.
Not to say the things that he truly feels, and not the words of someone who kneels.

Let the record shows I took all the blows and did it my way.

OW1 war absolute Liebe. Tausende Spielstunden darin gehabt.  Es gab ein Level System mit dem man immer einen ansporn hatte.

OW2 ist einfach nur Schmutz. Es gibt keinerlei Ansporn mehr zu spielen, Außer einem überteuertem Battlepass. Der PVE Modus ist auch komplett Grütze, da soll einem nur das Geld aus der Tasche gezogen werden.

This game pretends to be this "Free" product, but its just a scam in order for the dev's to rob you, because of there greed. They cancelled the PVE stuff we were all hyped about, and gave us a downgraded version of the content they promised. Not to mention that the story missions actually cost money. which is very stupid. oh but whats worse is that if you want to play with friends. every one in your group has to own them which I believe is a very greedy move, and I won't tolerate it, so yea these guys turned a 2016 GOTY game into a disappointment. 

I'm sorry, but I recommend you guys stick with TF2 instead
